abstract: Egyptian Interior Ministry says government has put to death Mahmoud Ramadan, who was convicted of murder during violence that ensued after military takeover of government in 2013; Ramadan is first Islamist supporter of ousted Pres Mohamed Morsi to be put to death.
lead_paragraph: Egypt’s government carried out the death penalty against a man convicted of murder during the political violence that followed the military takeover of the government in 2013, the Interior Ministry said.

headline.main: Egypt Executes an Islamist Supporter of Ousted President
headline.print_headline: Egypt Executes an Islamist Supporter of Ousted President

snippet: Egypt’s government carried out the death penalty against a man convicted of murder during the political violence that followed the military takeover of the government in 2013, the Interior Ministry said.
